text: @realDonaldTrump So was you saying that COVID19 wasn’t here until January. I swear to god I would rather have a fucking potato as a present than you, not much of a difference tho. Oh, did you have fun with epstin you sick fuck. Hope Melania leaves your sorry ass. FUCK TRUMP
